roleset.name: fill, soak
roleset.note: IMBUE-V NOTES: Framed by Jena (from imbue.01-v)

example.text: But, far important, is * to imbue the hearts and minds of local inhabitants and visitors alike with a deep appreciation of tea culture.
example.arg: the hears and minds of local inhabitants and visitors alike
with a deep appreication of tea culture
